Enter Division No. or (ALL) Text PPDField01 1 3 R Enter a valid division # or (ALL)
Enter (N)ew or (P)rinted DropDown PPDField02 1 1 R (N) for new orders (P) for orders already printed H N,P N,P
Enter Starting Order No. or (ALL) Text PPDField03 1 7 R Enter starting order # or (ALL)
Enter Ending Order No. or (ALL) Text PPDField04 1 7 R Enter Ending Order # or (ALL)
Enter Starting Date or (ALL) DropDown PPDField05 6 8 R
H ALL ALL
Enter Ending Date or (ALL) DropDown PPDField06 6 8 R Enter an ending date (MM/DD/YY) or (ALL) H ALL ALL
Enter Starting Customer No. or (ALL) Text PPDField07 1 6 R Enter a valid customer # or (ALL)
Enter Ending Customer No. or (ALL) Text PPDField08 1 6 R Enter a valid customer # or (ALL)
Enter (S)ummary, (D)etail, or (B)oth DropDown PPDField09 1 1 R
H S,D,B S,D,B
